faq.subtitle: Need help?
faq.description: Find answers to your most common questions

tickets.a1: You can buy your tickets directly on our website by selecting the desired ticket type and proceeding with secure payment.
tickets.q2: Can I cancel or refund my ticket?
tickets.a2: Tickets are non-refundable except in case of event cancellation. Contact us for more information.

event.a1: Doors usually open 1 hour before the show starts. Check the program section for detailed schedules.
event.a2: There is no strict dress code, but smart casual attire is appreciated.

payment.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a1: We accept Mobile Money payments (Wave, Orange Money, MTN, Moov) and credit cards (Visa, Mastercard).
payment.a2: Yes, all payments are processed securely through our certified partners.
